sections.title: Structure

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Applicable as the section relates to a gene/protein, and an infobox would be expected.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The section does not include an infobox.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The guideline specifies the inclusion of an infobox for gene/protein articles, which is absent here.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: An infobox should summarize the key facts about the subject, which is applicable here.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: No infobox is present to summarize key facts.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: An infobox summarizing key facts is missing from the section, not adhering to the requirement.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Imperative standard for having an infobox at the top is unmet as no infobox exists.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The top of the article does not have any infobox.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The absence of an infobox represents a lack of adherence to this requirement.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The text does not address the presence of an ortholog which makes the applicability of this requirement unclear.
The section does not discuss non-human orthologs making this requirement irrelevant.

sections.meta_notes: The section lacks the required infoboxes which detracts from necessary best practices in documenting protein structure.
